    "formula": [
        "a(n) = T(n,22); T(n,k) = Sum_{i=1..n} binomial(n+1, i)*binomial(k-1, i-1)*binomial(n-i+k, k).",
        "From _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 25 2022: (Start)",
        "a(n) = (n+1)*binomial(n+21, 22)*Hypergeometric3F2([-21, -n, 1-n], [2, -n-21], 1).",
